1307590.name: Steel Division 2 - Reinforcement Pack #9 - Army General Versus
1307590.description:
Outsmart and outfight your human opponent in Steel Division 2’s Army General with this free Reinforcement Pack, introducing the hotly anticipated Versus feature.

Army General Versus brings 1v1 online battles to Army General, the turn-based strategic campaign mode for Steel Division 2.

Each player takes command of their army, maneuvering their units and planning their next attack carefully during their turn. Their flesh-and-blood opponent will do the same until it’s time to do battle. Autoresolve or prepare for online combat on the battlefield!

Each individual Army General campaign, including those featured in Steel Division 2’s expansions, The Death on the Vistula and The Fate of Finland, can now be played in Army General Versus mode.

Army General Versus comes as part of a Reinforcement Pack, available for free to all owners of Steel Division 2.
1307590.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
